#Receipe for Boulevardier
![](https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4614/38757957455_89673d5e59_z.jpg)

####Ingredients
* 2 ounces bourbon or rye whiskey
* 1 ounce red vermouth
* 1 ounce Campari
* Ice

####Extra Ingredients
* Orange peel 
* A cherry

####Steps of the Recipe
1. Mix everything
2. Add ice to taste
3. You're done!
